verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against it,

And <S%H559>say<s%> unto it, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, O <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, I am against thee, and I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> against thee, and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee <S%H4923>most<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%>.
I will <S%H7760>lay<s%> thy <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H2723>waste<s%>, and thou shalt be <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Because thou hast had a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H342>hatred<s%>, and hast <S%H5064>shed<s%> the blood of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H3027>force<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%>, in the <S%H6256>time<s%> that their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> had an <S%H7093>end<s%>:

Therefore, as I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, I will <S%H6213>prepare<s%> thee unto <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> thee: <S%H518>sith<s%> thou hast not <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, even <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> thee.

Thus will I <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H8077>most<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from it him that passeth <S%H5674>out<s%> and him that <S%H7725>returneth<s%>.

And I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H2022>mountains<s%> with his <S%H2491>slain<s%> men: in thy <S%H1389>hills<s%>, and in thy <S%H1516>valleys<s%>, and in all thy <S%H650>rivers<s%>, shall they <S%H5307>fall<s%> that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8077>desolations<s%>, and thy <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall not <S%H7725%H3427>return<s%>: and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Because thou hast <S%H559>said<s%>, These <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H776>countries<s%> shall be mine, and we will <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; whereas the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was there:

Therefore, as I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, I will even <S%H6213>do<s%> according to thine <S%H639>anger<s%>, and according to thine <S%H7068>envy<s%> which thou hast <S%H6213>used<s%> out of thy <S%H8135>hatred<s%> against them; and I will make myself <S%H3045>known<s%> among them, when I have <S%H8199>judged<s%> thee.

And thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and that I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> all thy <S%H5007>blasphemies<s%> which thou hast <S%H559>spoken<s%> against the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, They are laid <S%H8074%H8077>desolate<s%>, they are <S%H5414>given<s%> us to <S%H402>consume<s%>.
Thus with your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> ye have <S%H1431>boasted<s%> against me, and have <S%H6280>multiplied<s%> your <S%H1697>words<s%> against me: I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> them.
Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; When the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiceth<s%>, I will <S%H6213>make<s%> thee <S%H8077>desolate<s%>.

As thou didst <S%H8057>rejoice<s%> at the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, because it was <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, so will I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto thee: thou shalt be <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, O <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, and all <S%H123>Idumea<s%>, even all of it: and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
